item.title: [HBASE-3328] Admin API: Explicit Split Points
item.description: Add the ability to explicitly split an existing region at a user-specified point. Currently, you can disable automated splitting and can presplit a newly-created table at explicit boundaries, but cannot explicitly bound a split of an existing region.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Review request for hbase.

Summary
-------

Add the ability to explicitly split an existing region at a user-specified point. Currently, you can disable automated splitting and can presplit a newly-created table at explicit boundaries, but cannot explicitly bound a split of an existing region.

This addresses bug HBASE-3328.
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-3328
